title: MD
biography: The Vaccine War is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language medical docudrama film directed by Vivek Agnihotri and produced by Pallavi Joshi. It tells about the development of Covaxin during the COVID-19 pandemic in India, shedding light on the efforts of scientists involved in its creation. It is based on the book "Going Viral" by Prof Balram Bhargava of Indian Council of Medical Research.
aiSummary: Samiran Panda is a epidemiology - hiv surveillance specialist with an H-index of 110 at ICMR (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, The Lancet Infectious Diseases, The Lancet Global Health. Based in India.
